Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at  Cermak-Chinatown
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Cermak-Chinatown due to due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Cermak-Chinatown due to due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Westbound Reroute near North Avenue/Laramie
ShortDescription: WB 72 North buses are temp. rerouted via North Avenue, Laramie, Division, Central and North Avenue: due to, fire department activity near North Avenue/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound  #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Laramie, Division, Central and North Avenue: due to, fire department activity near North Avenue/Laramie.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Westbound Reroute near  Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont,  due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th bound Red trains bypassing Cermak-Chinatown
ShortDescription: 95th bound Red line trains will bypass Cermak-Chinatown  due to police activity.  We apologize for the inconvenience, updates will follow shortly.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th bound Red line trains will bypass Cermak-Chinatown  due to police activity.  We apologize for the inconvenience, updates will follow shortly. 

 

Allow extra travel time.
